TopicTitle: how are you going to wait for 1.0?

Articles.Content:
waiting for 1.0 like

![bFANcrl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/bFANcrl.jpg)
I'm in no hurry, I've learned over the years to not plan my day around game releases ... hopefully it will be there/ready when I get home at the end of the day.
I'm not going to wait long. I have four tabs that I ma constantly refreshing though.
I am just making useless comments on the forum.
Yeah, I'm gonna obsessively refresh the store page.
I'll be working from 11-930 and won't see my computer til almost 11pm CST.

> 
> I'll be working from 11-930 and won't see my computer til almost 11pm CST.

oh that sucks.

Imma just dual screen skyrim and the store page while i wait lol
Completely cleaned out the the KSP folder and am downloading a fresh copy on Steam so when it updates I can just go!
Playing *Windward.* Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Much of fun.
Being a student with finals looming. If I'm lucky a bunch of my favorite mods would've been updated by the time I can play again

I'm +8 GMT, so I'm guessing I'll probably be fast asleep while KSP Steam updates...but I'll see it in the morning so... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- Got a script automatically refreshing the store page every couple minutes

- random forum reading

- watching Archer

- freaking out about the really high levels of traffic on [http://KerbalX.com/countdown](http://KerbalX.com/countdown) as the timer is now below 20 mins (which is way too soon, com'on everyone, guess later times!!!)

- chain drinking tea.

[![jZ1Ik6yl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/jZ1Ik6yl.jpg)](http://imgur.com/jZ1Ik6y)

SO FRIGGEN EXICITED THAT MY NOODLES OVERCOOKED!!!

D:

Seriously thou, so very excited!

1) Get home from day job

2) Do some power yoga

3) Cook / eat

4) Do a couple of hours freelance work

5) Shower

6) Fire up KSP 1.0

You rarely wait for anything when you're constantly busy xD

SOmething something...danger ZooOoOne~

I'm planning to finish the Jool-4 mission I'm currently doing in a 0.90 sandbox (with quicksaves). Been to Laythe (had to quickload 3 times to get to a usable landing spot) and Vall yesterday, today I'll try to land on Bop and Pol. If I manage to return before 1.0 is released, well, I'll go to sleep, go to work, and play 1.0 tomorrow.

I'm currently rewatching a few old Youtube reviews, reading the GI Joe wiki and drawing some concept art, with Steam open in the toolbar so I can see if it starts downloading anything. We'll see which gives first.
Work. I'm meeting with a new client this afternoon. Then I have to teach a class downtown. I won't be home until after 10pm ... so no KSP until tomorrow no matter what happens.
Impatiently, jumping up and down while updating the server page every 15m (got a timer set on my G510).
Get blind drunk count?
